title: CH-47 Chinook Helicopter: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The CH-47 Chinook Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 70 dynamic sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. It's ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

CH-47 Chinook Sound System offers an easily customizable flight model of the American transport helicopter, and provides highly detailed sound effects based on authentic audio recordings, offering immersive experiences for users.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, rotor thrust and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds for the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


The sound effects are meticulously crafted for various perspectives: exterior, distant, and cockpit views, brings to life every rotor's rotation, every engine's roar, and every gust of wind slicing through the air. They dynamically adjust based on parameters of the flight model, such as engine RPM, velocity, rotor thrust, and more. This ensures that the helicopter sounds incredibly realistic, enhancing the overall gaming or simulation experience.


There are about 35 high-quality helicopter engine sounds and more than 30 weapon sounds. Feel the adrenaline rush as you use the M134 minigun or the M240 machine gun from the gunner seat, adding a whole new level of intensity to your simulation.


And for those looking to take their multiplayer projects to the next level, our plugin seamlessly integrates sound and flight model replication. So whether you're embarking on a solo mission or engaging in adrenaline-pumping multiplayer battles, the "CH-47 Chinook: Sound System + Flight Model" plugin ensures an electrifying experience every time.
technicalDetails:
Code Module:Â CH47_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


CH-47 CHINOOK HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO

  • Enable "CH47_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check CH47_FlightModel_BP and CH47_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the CH47_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
